com.imagero.uio
Class ByteArrayIO

java.lang.Object
  com.imagero.uio.ByteArrayIO
public class ByteArrayIO
extends java.lang.Object

ByteArrayIO - this class gives the possibility to read from and write to given ByteArray. It supports bit offsets and bitwise writing. It does not extends InputStream or OutputStream, but has similar methods. Date: 09.04.2008

read

public static int read(ByteArray ba,
                       byte[] b,
                       int off,
                       int len)
Reads data from input stream into an byte array.

Parameters:
b - the buffer into which the data is read.
off - the start offset of the data.
len - the maximum number of bytes read.
Returns:
the total number of bytes read into the buffer, or -1 if the EOF has been reached.
Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - if supplied byte array is null

Parameters:
n - the number of bytes to be skipped.
Returns:
the actual number of bytes skipped.
